name: Stable Dynamics Inc.
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 49 Jam

Stable Dynamics Inc

physics game where you test the movement gear of an unstable robot prototype

Controls
  • Mouse: Foot Target Location Aim
  • Left Mouse Button: Confirm Target Foot Location
  • Right Mouse Button: Skip Foot
  • Spacebar: Dual Feet Targeting (Jump)
Overview
  • blockout intro cutscene
  • four tutorial levels
  • started as compo - swapped to jam 
  • made in two days 
  • definitely stable controls - not so stable robot
  • everything was done by me except for:
    • blockout textures
    • sounds 
    • photo of the moon
    • text to speech synthesis audio
  • a list of external sources is included in the readme file
  • no time was left to include a skip button for the intro + tutorial and include an actual game

Mac build will be uploaded soon

Walk Mechanic as of Sunday
